revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR940N |revision=v4.x |series=N450 |ean=6935364092887 |asin=B003Y5RYNY, B00MIFM3R8 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |fcc_date=02/04/2015 |fcc_id=TE7WR941NXV6 |pcb_id= |type=wireless router |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=TP9343;TP9343-AL3A, E5A826B, 1406, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32FVSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40GTP-50L |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=TP9343;TP9343-AL3A, E5A826B, 1406, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|450Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_TL-WR940N.html Product page]
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr940n ''TP-LINK TL-WR940N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([https://wiki.openwrt.org/_media/media/tplink/tl-wr940/tl-wr940n-v4.jpg ''images''])
The TP-Link WR940N is identical to the TL-WR941ND (detachable) except that :the antennas are not detachable and the hardware version is different. :(N - fixed (integral) antennas, ND - removable antennas) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v1.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v4.x]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v2.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v5.x]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v3.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v6.x]] :There is no WR941ND-equivalent for v4, yet.
*3x 5dBi Fixed Omni Directional Antenna :The only difference between v3 and v4 is a more economic board layout :in v4 (smaller, different power supply) and an incompatible bootloader :(both U-Boot-Mods). The major hardware components are identical.
===See also=== :;[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v5.x]] ([https://remont-aud.net/dump/planshety_i_ehl_knigi/tp_link/tp_link_tl_wr940n_es_v5_shassi_main_board_tl_wr940n_es_v5/466-1-0-87427 ES v5]) :CPU: [[QCA]] TP9343, W25Q32CSIG *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v6.x]]
